element.name: IcbType
element.short: Interface that identifies that an implementing object is a type.
element.descr: All objects implementing this, can be assigned as types for elements such as variables, method parameters and constants and such.

element.name: TcbComponent
element.short: The TcbComponent object is the root object of all code generating objects in the ClassBuilder framework.

descr.p: The object provides access to an optional Logger (specifically the log4fpc TLogger type), and a TXMLConfig object for passing any configuration to the code generating classes. Also a list of child components are being stored in the object, and the constructor ensures that any decendant will register itself with it's owner as a child.

p.remark: Perhaps I could consider making an interface for the TLogger class an making a decendant that implements it - in order for people with other logging suits to be able to switch the logger - dependancy injection.
